oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-11-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 30, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Red Hayes, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 948th broadcast, though in fact it is likely the 947th.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Louvin Brothers; Stringbean; Jim Reeves
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jim Reeves introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Jim Reeves) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Jim Reeves introduces the Louvin Brothers -- Call Me (Louvin Brothers) -- Jim Reeves introduces Stringbean -- Fly Around My Pretty Little Miss (Stringbean) -- Jim Reeves talks -- Anna Marie (Jim Reeves) -- Closing statement (Jim Reeves) -- Closing theme -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hayes, Red; Reeves, Jim; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965
